task_description: Navigate to Franklin Park. The route follows a straight path along the road, keeping Franklin Park visible on the right side throughout. The path passes a FedEx Office and crosses an intersection near The Hamilton hotel, continuing straight alongside the park. No turns or stairs are taken, and the movement is entirely on the main street.
